info.name: Sage - Nicer for FF4 on OSX
info.description:
Sage's appearance in general has been irking me for quite a while, especially since migrating to OSX. Here is a neat little style to fix some of the problems I had with it.

P.S. The "twisty" (arrow thing) is hidden under the folder icon and still operates normally.

P.P.S. I was going to do something with the resize gripper between the two lists, but I decided I liked it better blank.
info.additionalInfo: 23/08/2013 v.06: Fixed XUL target to allow Firefox 23 compatibility. Hopefully it won't break backwards compatibility.
